column1: Kata Robata////We had the smoked duck salad - perfect ratio of tender duck breast
column2: avocado and sushi.  We also had some robata items - the beef & asparagus was killer; again perfect ratio of meat to vegetable to sauce.  The sushi was divine as well
column3: the yellowtail practically melted in my mouth.  The beef carpaccio is one of those dishes that if done improperly will be disgusting and probably leave you with a stomach ache for a a day or so.  I'm happy to report the beef was sliced perfectly and seasoned just right with the perfect amount of sea salt to add that crunch and saltiness.
